Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Bathe the cat in the bathtub.', '2. Use a towel to dry the cat.']

def has_water_in_bathtub(bathtub:item):
    # Function to check if the bathtub has water in it
    symbol has_water=has_water(bathtub)
    return has_water

behavior fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve open(bathtub) # Open the bathtub (implies turning on the water)
        assert has_water_in_bathtub(bathtub) # Ensure the bathtub has water
        
behavior bathe_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub) # Place the cat inside the bathtub
        wash(cat) # Wash the cat in the bathtub
        scrub(cat) # Scrub the cat gently as part of the bath
        rinse(cat) # Rinse the cat to remove any soap
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat
        
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select the bathtub
        
        if not has_water_in_bathtub(bathtub):
            fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub)
            # Ensure the bathtub is filled with water before bathing the cat
        
        bathe_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

['1. Gently place the cat into the bathtub.', '2. Wash the cat thoroughly with water.', '3. Use a to
wel to dry the cat completely.']

behavior bring_cat_to_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve close(cat, bathtub)
        # Ensure the cat is close to the bathtub

behavior place_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Gently place the cat inside the bathtub

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select the bathtub
        
        bring_cat_to_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
        place_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Bathe the cat in the bathtub.', '2. Use a towel to dry the cat.']

behavior clean_cat(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(cat)
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        is_faucet(cat) # Fill bathtub with water to bathe the cat
        achieve has_water(cat)
        achieve clean(cat)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        
        clean_cat(cat, bathtub)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Gently place the cat in the bathtub and shower it.', '2. Use a towel to dry the cat completely.
']

behavior wash_cat_in_bathtub(cat: item, bathtub: item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, cat)
        achieve close(cat, bathtub)
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        achieve has_water(bathtub)
        wash(cat)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        wash_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
